scripts.build:compile: npm run dev:format && npm run build:clean && tsc
scripts.build:copy: rimraf ../out/server/* && recursive-copy dist ../out/server/dist && recursive-copy package.json ../out/server/package.json && recursive-copy views ../out/server/views
scripts.build:full: npm run build:compile && npm run build:copy && npm run build:clean
scripts.dev:start: npm run console:clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --require=dotenv/config --respawn --clear --watch .env src/index.ts
